original_text:
Olasunkanmi Agbajelola
Crafting Engaging Narratives: Your Brand’s Voice in the Digital Landscape
Ibadan  23402
julisunkan@gmail.com
+234 916 650 1964
Dynamic and results-driven Social Media Manager with 10 years of experience in developing and
executing innovative social media strategies that drive engagement and brand growth. Proven track
record in content creation, community management, and data analysis to optimize performance across
various platforms.
Adept at leveraging emerging trends and tools to enhance brand visibility and foster meaningful
connections with audiences. Strong communication skills with a keen eye for detail and a passion for
storytelling that aligns with business objectives.
Committed to staying ahead of industry trends to deliver impactful results.
Willing to relocate: Anywhere
Personal Details
Currently Employed: Yes
Date of Birth: 1988-12-25
Highest Level of Education: Master's
Industry: Other
NYSC Status: Completed
Work Experience
Social Media Manager & Wordpress Developer
Department of Obstetrics & Gynaecology, U.C.H, Ibadan -Ibadan
March 2014 to September 2024
• Strategy Development**: I created and implemented social media strategies that aligned with the
brand goals.
• Content Creation**: I developed engaging content, including text, images, and videos, tailored for each
platform.
• Community Management**: I monitored and engaged with followers, responding to comments and
messages to build relationships.
• Analytics and Reporting**: I analyzed performance metrics and prepared reports to assess the
effectiveness of campaigns.
• Trend Monitoring**: I stayed updated on industry trends and emerging platforms to keep content
relevant.
• Collaboration**: I worked with marketing, PR, and design teams to ensure cohesive messaging.
• Paid Advertising**: I managed social media advertising campaigns, including budget allocation and
performance tracking.
• Brand Management**: I ensured consistent brand voice and messaging across all social media channels.
• Crisis Management**: I addressed negative feedback and manage the brand's reputation online.
• Training and Leadership**: I mentored junior staff and provided guidance on best practices in social
media management.
1. I developed series of websites for the students’ educational purpose.
2. I maintained web portals and mobile apps designed for students’ registration and administrative
purpose.
3. I obtained and evaluated all relevant information to handle product and service inquiries.
4. I provided high-level administrative support by conducting scientific researches, prepared
statistical reports, handled information requests, and performed clerical functions such as preparing
correspondence, arranging conferences, and scheduling meetings.
5. Analysis and interpretation of data, such as demographic characteristics, history and extent of disease,
procedures and treatment for publication in scientific journals.
Personal Secretary / Communication Officer
Personal Secretary -Ibadan
May 2014 to June 2015
• I assisted with content creation for various social media platforms to promote the activities of the
individual I worked with.
• I generated and wrote reports for various educational journals and magazines on behalf of my employer.
• I provided communication backstopping for events and professional activities for my employer.
• I assist with content generation for the personal website of my employer.
• I scheduled interviews and meeting between my employer and various organizations.
Education
Master's in Physiology (Reproduction & Developmental Programming)
University of Ibadan  - Ibadan
September 2015 to October 2016
Skills
•Website Development, Corel Graphics, Computer Troubleshooting & Repair (10+ years)
•Software Development (Visual Studio & Android Studio) using C++, Java, OOP, .Net framework (10+
years)
•Digital Marketing & Social Media Optimization (10+ years)
Languages
•English Language - Fluent
•Yoruba Language - Fluent
Links
https://digitalskeleton.com.ng
Certifications and Licenses
CITI Program: West African Bioethics Training Program
November 2014 to Present
Additional Information
This certification consists of two modules:
A. Nigerian National Code For Health Research Ethics.
(ID 40433)
B. Human Research (ID 3926)
job_description:
Job Role: Social Media Manager

Job Type: Full-time (5 or 6 Days) | Remote

Salary: 60,000NGN

Job Requirements:

Proven experience managing Instagram and TikTok accounts for a brand or business (portfolio or case studies required).
Strong understanding of social media analytics tools (e.g., Instagram Insights, TikTok Analytics, or third-party platforms like Hootsuite, Later, etc.).
Proficiency in content creation tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Creative Suite, CapCut, or similar) for designing visuals and editing videos.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills with a knack for crafting engaging captions and scripts.
Deep knowledge of current social media trends, hashtags, and influencer culture on Instagram and TikTok.
Ability to work independently, manage multiple projects, and meet deadlines in a remote setting.
Must have good knowledge of managing DMs; responding to DMs to ensure customer satisfaction and timely delivery.
Must live in a location with food power supply.
Availability for occasional in-office visits (approximately [specify frequency, e.g., once a quarter]) for meetings or content creation.
Experience with paid social media advertising (e.g., Instagram Ads, TikTok Ads).

resume_keywords: a. nigerian national code for health research ethics
physiology (reproduction & developmental programming) university of ibadan - ibadan
olasunkanmi agbajelola crafting engaging narratives: your brand’s voice
